To achieve the mission, I should have focused on moving down to reach the purple box instead of going up and exploring other areas. I should have also used my key to open the door and access new areas. A better subgoal planning strategy would be to prioritize moving down and exploring the area where the purple box is located.

New subgoal list: ['move down to (5, 5)','move to purple box', 'pick up purple box', 'achieve the "mission" as soon as possible']
